contexts.context: ...consider his wonderful example of heroic sacrifice. Warren's <mark>deed</mark> is a compelling challenge to every one present,...
...call of duty and of unselfish service. This <mark>deed</mark> should, and I confidently trust, will be an...
...remedy on earth for these disorders so effectual as <mark>deeds</mark> not words of kindess, of self forgetfulness,...
...unselfish sacrifice. May we not treasure Warren's heroic <mark>deed</mark> enacted in our midst as a reminder to all...
